title._content: [Unidentified backyard garden, probably in New York, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Unidentified backyard garden, probably in New York, New York. Pergola] [ca. 1922] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Same image as lantern slide LC-J717-X107-9, with white rather than orange flowers. On slide (handwritten): "[ba]ckyard." Also, red-edged square with line through middle. Slide for lecturing on city and suburban gardens. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16656 Call Number: LC-J717-X107- 12
